hints.label: alg-antichain-detection
hints.title: Compute Minimal Separating Antichain
hints.content:
1917: :label: alg-antichain-detection
1918: 
1919: **Input**:
1920: - Fractal Set $\mathcal{F} = (\mathcal{N}, E_{\text{CST}})$
1921: - Spatial region $A \subset \mathcal{X}$
1922: 
1923: **Output**: Minimal separating antichain $\gamma_A$
1924: 
1925: **Procedure**:
1926: 
1927: 1. **Initialize**: $\gamma_A = \emptyset$, $\text{Visited} = \emptyset$
1928: 
1929: 2. **For each episode** $e_i \in \mathcal{N}$ with $x_i \in A$ (inside $A$):
1930:    - If $e_i$ has no descendants in $A$ but has descendants in $\bar{A}$:
1931:      - Add $e_i$ to $\gamma_A$
1932: 
1933: 3. **Minimality check**: Iterate through $\gamma_A$ and remove any episode $e_j$ such that removing $e_j$ still leaves a separating antichain
1934: 
1935: 4. **Return** $\gamma_A$

hints.label: alg-surface-integral-compute
hints.title: Compute Surface Integral for Comparison
hints.content:
1941: :label: alg-surface-integral-compute
1942: 
1943: **Input**:
1944: - Surface $\partial A_{\min}$ (triangulated mesh)
1945: - QSD density $\rho_{\text{spatial}}(x)$
1946: - Metric $g(x)$
1947: 
1948: **Output**: $\int_{\partial A_{\min}} \rho_{\text{spatial}}(x) \, d\Sigma_g(x)$
1949: 
1950: **Procedure**:
1951: 
1952: 1. **For each triangle** $T \in \text{mesh}(\partial A_{\min})$:
1953:    - Compute centroid $x_c = (x_0 + x_1 + x_2) / 3$
1954:    - Evaluate $\rho_c = \rho_{\text{spatial}}(x_c)$
1955:    - Compute Riemannian area $A_g(T)$ using fan triangulation ({prf:ref}`alg-fan-triangulation-area` from {doc}`10_areas_volumes_integration.md`)
1956:    - Add $\rho_c \cdot A_g(T)$ to total
1957: 
1958: 2. **Return** total

hints.label: rem-numerical-validation
hints.title: Testing Strategy
hints.content:
1966: :label: rem-numerical-validation
1967: 
1968: **Test 1: Uniform density flat space**
1969: - Set $g = I$ (Euclidean), $U_{\text{eff}} = \text{const}$
1970: - Expect $|\gamma_A| / N \to \rho_0 \cdot \text{Area}(\partial A)$
1971: - Verify for spheres, cubes, ellipsoids
1972: 
1973: **Test 2: Gaussian fitness landscape**
1974: - $U_{\text{eff}}(x) = \|x\|^2 / 2$ (quadratic potential)
1975: - $g = I + \epsilon H$ with $H = \nabla^2 U$
1976: - Compare $|\gamma_A| / N$ with computed surface integral
1977: 
1978: **Test 3: Convergence rate**
1979: - Vary $N \in \{100, 1000, 10000, 100000\}$
1980: - Plot $\log(\text{error})$ vs. $\log(N)$
1981: - Verify slope $\approx -1/d$
